js:Module.p: rAppid.js is the next generation rich internet application framework with the following features and patterns:

ul.li: loading dependencies dynamically on demand with require.js
code behind and inline script business logic
binding {model.submodel.key} and two-way-binding {{two.way.binding}} from models to components
event handler registration in XML with onClick="clickHandler(event)"
support all html5 elements from scratch
on callback for success and errors callback(err, ...)

ol.li: move rAppid.js to node.js and share models
